 The main runner of the game loop.
 
bool runTitle ()
 The runner and handler for the title screen.
 
CityType newYear ()
 The first phase of the game loop where vicotry is checked, cards reshuffled, peace chits are distributed, USA influence, production, govenment phase occur.
 
void reshuffle (const bool animation)
 New Year phase where Cards in the discard piles will be added to both draw decks and then the whole deck will be reshuffled.
 
void peaceDividends ()
 All players who have been peacful (not DoW's or VoN in the past year) will recieve a random chit of 0, 1, or 2 VP's. This happens in the first year as well.
 
void decideTurnOrder (const bool animation=false)
 New Year phase where the turn order of the players is decided for the following year. A D6 is rolled and depending on the number the strting player, and rotation is decided.
 
void newYearRes ()
 In specific years 1 WEST influence will be added to the USA and if the USA is already a satellite then one of each unit will be automattically added to Washington and New York.
 
void production ()
 Phase where players can spend there production (lowest of pop/res/ind) on buying cards, building cadres, and upgrading units. Runs on the turn order until all have gone through.
 
void applyProduction (Player &player)
 Once a player has passed, their choices in the production phase (card bought, cadres made, units upgraded) is finalized and applied.
 
bool deal (Player *player, size_t amount, const char state='A')
 Deal a set amount of cards to the player of action or invest. Hand limit doesn't apply to card drawing. The player will draw up onto the amount or the number of cards remaining in the deck.
 
void government ()
 Phase where players play action cards to add influence and play investment cards, goes in turn order until all have passed.
 
bool addDiplomacy (Player &player, Country *country)
 Handler for the player playing an action card to add influence to a country on an action card (assuming the player has a valid card with the country)
 
void resolveDiplomacy ()
 Initiates diplomacy resolutions at the end of the goverment phase, changing the influence level of the country and changing the population.
 
bool increaseIndustry (Player &player)
 Handler for increasing the player's industry and removing the cards used for doing so.
 
bool canPair (const Player &player, const Tech *tech1, const Tech *tech2) const
 Decider for if the player can combine the two selected techs to achieve a new technology (also handles year cards)
 
bool canCoup (Player &player)
 Decider for if the player is able to coup on the current country selected.
 
void coup (Player &player)
 Handler for couping (removing a rival's influence)
 
bool canSabotage (Player &player)
 Decider for if the play can sabotage (lower a rival's IND) the current selected rival.
 
void sabotage (Player &player)
 Handler for sabotaging (lower a rival's IND) a rival and removing the card responsible.
 
bool canSpyRing (Player &player)
 Decider for if the player can use a Spy Ring (take a random card from a Rival)
 
void spyRing (Player &player)
 Handler for using Spy Ring (take a random card from a rival)and removing the card responsible.
 
void checkHands ()
 TODO check players hand size.
 
void sortCommand ()
 Sort the turn order of the players based on their played command cards (season->command priority->command value->random)
 
bool compareCards (const ActionCard *lhs, const ActionCard *rhs)
 Comparator for two Action Cards to see which has priority for command.
 
void addMovement (Player &player)
 Handler for adding the current selected city to the player's movement memo (or removing)
 
void setDefenders (Player &attacker)
 Set which Rivals/Minors are able to be attacked in the currently selected city.
 
void handleBattleSelect (Player &player)
 Handler for user input on adding/removing battles for the combat phase.
 
void setLandBattleable (Player &attacker, Player &defender)
 Set which units are able to be attacked in a land battle.
 
void spring ()
 Spring season of war where players will commence the war. Action cards with spring will have priority.
 
void summer ()
 Summer season of war where players will commence the war and after which blockades will be added. Action cards with SUMMER will have priority.
 
void blockade ()
 At the end of summer, cities who cannot trace a trade route to the Main Capital of its ruler is blockaded and the pop/res won't be counted in production.
 
void fall ()
 Fall season of war where players will commence the war. Action cards with FALL will have priority.
 
void winter ()
 The winter season of war where the USSR player can act inside of the bounds of the USSR. Only the USSR player can act during this turn.
 
bool mapPlayer (Player &player)
 Goes over the players holdings over the map and sums up their pop, res, CV.
 
void mapPlayerResPop (Player &player)
 Goes through each city and country the player owns and set the RES and POP of the player.
 
bool checkTradeRoutes (Player &player, const string &main_capital)
 During the production phase it needs to verify all cities controlled by the player that are blockaded are still blockaded (route can only include 1 land segment and 1 sea segment)
 
bool isSupllied (const Player &player, City *city, const CityType allegiance)
 A decider for if the city provided is supplied and can have steps built. All the cities on the route are marked as supplied to decrease redundancy.
 
City * getClosestCity (const Player &player, const int x, const int y) const
 Get the city closest to the provided coordinates.
 
ProductionError canBuild (const Player &player, City *city, const UnitType unit)

bool setBuildable (Player &player)

Unit * buildUnit (Player &player, City *city, const UnitType unit, const int cv=1)

ProductionError canUpgrade (const Player &player, City *city, const UnitCountry nationality, const Unit *unit)

void handleUnitBuilding (Player &player)

bool flipConvoy (Player &player, City *city, Unit *unit)
 
void moveUnit (Player &player)
 
MovementMessage canLandMove (const Player &player, const Unit *unit) const
 Decider for if the unit is able to move through the current movement memo with land movement (cannot go enter oceans and limited to straits and land borders and abide by border restrictions if engaging)
 
MovementMessage canSeaMove (const Player &player, const Unit *unit) const
 Decider for if the unit is able to move through the current movement memo with sea movement (can enter oceans and limited to onlt one 'land move' to an adjacent coastal city and doesn't abide by border restrictions)
 
MovementMessage canAirMove (const Player &player, const Unit *unit) const
 Decider for if the unit is able to move through the current movement memo (no restrictions on border types) (if starting in an ocean it must end it in a land city and doesn't abide by border restrictions)

Detailed Description

The main controller of the game and controls sequence of play.
